description: Bursting with zingy lemon flavours, this tasty one-tray chicken drumstick recipe is a breeze to whip up.
name: One-tray roasted lemon pepper drumsticks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 small lemons (save 1 zested and juiced, 1 thinly sliced)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Make 3 shallow cuts on both sides of each drumstick, then place in a large greased roasting pan.
Combine zest, lemon juice, cornflour, salt flakes and lemon pepper in a small bowl. Add to chicken and toss to coat. Stand for 10 minutes to allow flavours to infuse.
Add lemon slices and 1/4 cup water to roasting pan. Bake for 35 minutes or until chicken is golden and cooked through.
Prepare salad kit according to packet instructions. Serve chicken with salad and bread, and drizzled with pan juices.
